Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Pistons (15-18) are expected to continue their recent surge when hosting the Charlotte Hornets (7-25) after a victory over the Orlando Magic despite Jaden Ivey's fibula fracture.
The Charlotte Hornets are struggling with multiple key player absences, including LaMelo Ball and Brandon Miller, and have lost eight consecutive games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be held at Little Caesars Arena in Detroit.
Betting odds and promotions are available through various platforms.
